story.html:
<align="center">[sprite=40] Fri 15th - Mon 18th Sep 4pm UTC</align>

Celebrate the release of Thirty Seconds to Mars' new album and join their special Beat Chaser event now!

Play to win their song <style="Bold">Seasons</style>, an <style="Bold">exclusive track skin</style> and more in-game merch!

<style="Bold">Grand Prize</style>: Seasons - Thirty Seconds To Mars

stories.title: Thirty Seconds to Mars Event live now!

story.html:
<align="center"><style="H1"><style="Bold"><color=#f4be4e><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:3520ef3f-9873-425b-b079-8bd59901cbb5">CLAIM!</style></color></link></style></style></align>

<style="Bold">Thirty Seconds to Mars</style> are back with their new album <style="Italic">It's The End Of The World But It's A Beautiful Day</style>, out on Friday 15th September.

Pre-save the album now to <style="Bold">claim [sprite=1] 25</style> and get ready for a <style="Bold">special Beat Chaser event</style> this weekend!

<align="center"><style="H1"><style="Bold"><color=#f4be4e><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:501e5107-92f2-4b28-aac2-0c6913213f1b">PRE-REGISTER!</style></color></link></style></style></align>

Our <style="Bold">new music game Country Star</style> is launching soon and you can pre-register to play. <style="Bold">Sign up now to claim [sprite=1] 25</style>

If we reach our pre-reg goal, everyone will <style="Bold">unlock a FREE song</style> in Beatstar!

There are 3 new Deluxe songs available to unlock!
• Levels - Avicii [sprite=10]
• Sugar, We’re Goin Down - Fall Out Boy [sprite=9]
• Feel It Still - Portugal. The Man [sprite=9]

<style="Bold"><color=#5a65ea><style="Link"><link="https://discord.gg/beatstar">Join our Discord</style></color></link></style> and vote for which song should get a Deluxe Edition next!

<align="center">[sprite=40] Tue 12th - Thu 14th Sep 4pm UTC</align>

Blaze the Alternative trail in this midweek Beat Chaser event to win a new track skin, cards and more!

<style="Bold">Grand Prize</style>: Black Ink Track Skin

Feel the retro rush! Collect 9 songs from <style="Bold">Meghan Trainor</style>, <style="Bold">Thirty Seconds To Mars</style>, <style="Bold">Ne-Yo</style>, <style="Bold">Pitbull</style> and more!

<style="Bold">Tracklist</style>:
• Black And Gold - Sam Sparro [sprite=34]
• What I Got [sprite=9] - Sublime [sprite=34]
• Golden Skans - The Klaxons [sprite=34]
• All About That Bass - Meghan Trainor [sprite=34]
• Turbo [sprite=9] - The Nah [sprite=34]
• This Is War - Thirty Seconds To Mars [sprite=34]
• Word Up! - Cameo [sprite=34]
• Time Of Our Lives [sprite=9] - Ne-Yo, Pitbull [sprite=34]
• Plasma [sprite=10] - Sharks [sprite=34]

<align="center"><style="H1"><style="Bold"><color=#f4be4e><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:501e5107-92f2-4b28-aac2-0c6913213f1b">PRE-REGISTER!</style></color></link></style></style></align>

Our <style="Bold">new music game Country Star</style> is launching soon and you can pre-register to play. <style="Bold">Sign up now to claim [sprite=1] 25</style>

If we reach our pre-reg goal, everyone will <style="Bold">unlock a FREE song</style> in Beatstar! 

We've reached <style="Bold">62%</style> of our goal so far!

<align="center"><style="H1"><style="Bold"><color=#f4be4e><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:92158c21-56a8-43ae-b549-0aef417fe11f">CLAIM!</style></color></link></style></style></align>

You can now personalise Beatstar with <style="Bold">Avatars</style> and <style="Bold">Track Skins!</style>

Unlock your first skin for FREE and start building your Merch Collection now! [sprite=41]

<style="Bold">Tap above to claim your reward</style> and collect one of three random skins:
• Heartbeats Pop Skin
• Break Free Pop Skin
• Game Time Hip Hop Skin

Check out our socials for all the latest Beatstar news, giveaways, exclusive music content and more.

You'll get <style="Bold">5 Wishlist Cards</style> [sprite=21] when you follow us or join our Discord!

<style="Bold">Follow and join us now</style>:
• <style="Bold"><color=#dd2a7b><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:911051c1-19e2-4b2a-84c1-6ab805dd0c27">Instagram</style></color></link></style>
• <style="Bold"><color=#046de3><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:2962a5a8-02ba-4fb6-a794-20310478aff9">Facebook</style></color></link></style>
• <style="Bold"><color=#1c91da><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:57b7e7e7-cd35-4bb3-bb48-4624839b4c4a">Twitter</style></color></link></style>
• <style="Bold"><color=#e71d4f><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:c6eef4c1-f772-40da-89da-64ddc239682d">TikTok</style></color></link></style>
• <style="Bold"><color=#5865f2><style="Link"><link="deeplinkreward:c19321cc-6496-4561-bca7-6d06280cb0b8">Discord</style></color></link></style>

Do you listen to music? Do you play games? Now you can do both at the same time! 

<style="Bold">Invite your friends to play</style> and smash their records, or <style="Bold">compete against other players</style> around the world [sprite=8]

Don't see your favourite song in the game? Suggest it to us on <style="Bold"><color=#5865f2><style="Link"><link="https://discord.gg/beatstar">Discord</link></style> </style></color>so we know what you're interested in playing!

Now sit back, relax, and enjoy the music.
